name: Rotario Party
description:
A Tetris arcade game. But not exactly tetris, though.
Instead of moving the stone the field is moved.

The game has a stone immediate field. Use it to switch between next and immediate stone whenever you want.

Controls
  • Move stone: cursor keys, DPAD, left stick
  • Rotate stone: cursor up, B or Circle button
  • Lock stone: space, A or Cross button
  • Switch immediate stone: right shift, Y or Triangle button
  • Pause: Esc, Start or Options button
Scoring ActionScoreSonic drop 1 per cell Hard drop 2 per cell Single-line 100 × level Double-line 300 × level Triple-line 500 × level Tetris 800 × level Single-line perfect clear 800 × level Double-line perfect clear 1200 × level Triple-line perfect clear 1800 × level Tetris perfect clear 2000 × level

The game is considered stable alpha.
